entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
